attributes.action: MP’s & members of the House of Lords to divulge their Covid vaccination status.
attributes.additional_details: Some people in our society are being pressured to have a Covid  vaccine under the threat of losing their job. This is stupid, the vaccine does not stop you getting the virus or passing it on any less than not having the vaccine, so what is the point?
attributes.background: I want to see their Covid Vaccination status as there is talk of people being forced into having a vaccine or losing their job. These are the rule makers, we have a right to know if it’s a case of “do as we say…”

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to divulge medical information, including vaccination status, are a matter for individuals, including MPs and members of the House of Lords, not the Government or Parliament.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

All MP's & staff to have Covid19 Vaccine to attend & work at Parliament by law: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593408
